data.message: His album is dropping next month. We all knew he would try to gather the sheep with this one. Typical hate trump bandwagon. The shit is old.

replies.message: Gonna be another flop.  He is garbage for the last 10 yrs.
Chris Blake then stop being on his page and dont buy his cd hes always bin the best
No tweet from Trump, Marshall....he ain't givin the satisfaction.
Mike Sheehan *Trump is scared to respond.
Yeah, Eminem only went after Bill Clinton, congress, Bush, Bush, Bush.. multiple times, but apparently you are a dumbass.

True rappers have always been political
Fake asses like Kanye, now that's more debatable
Trump or no trump...Eminem has been garbage since 05-06....and I was a huge fan.  MMLP is in my all time favs.
David herb more like lol
if you were a huge fan of eminem then you would still listen to his music today so u are not a true fan
David Erb relax big guy. Im sure we all still are fans of Em
Desperate marketing I suppose.
Typical love trump bandwagon. The shit is old
Fuck Trump
Yep,  Eminem messed up by thinking he’s the stick that stirs the drink.  Now he should move to another country.
Chris Blake All your albums are garbage.
Alex Montagna  ROFL scared now that is funny he took on many people..already nice try, he dont care who the fuck MARSHALL Mathers, is....

Alex Montagna  Funny when Marshall lived in Detriot, he hated those type of people....Now he is acting like the very people he hated...Funny how that worked before he was FAMOUS....he is a sell OUT Loser, who pulls guns on people here...I knew MARSHALL personally before he was famous, he was super nice guy, to bad, he is an asshole, liberal trash now..
And yet here you are. On his fan page. Expressing your anger😂
Hate Trump specializes in Hate!

Trump hate bandwagon?
We're gonna need something bigger than a wagon.
Its easy to hate trump, every time he opens his mouth.
Jeffery Magrie he still lives in Detroit though CX. And he's always been pretty true to his politics.

Sounds about right coming from a racist little white boy who supports Trump, thinks someone can only state their opinion when it aligns w his, probably belongs to a sorority, and his rich daddys probably had to fight rape charges against him bc he's a douchebag. I hope the Trump haters band wagon runs you over 🤗
Let this album Flop !!!!!!!!!
Em, let go, it's over, you're too old !!!!!
